column4: holy s**t f**k ..... I just formatted my external hdd from ntfs to vfat using mkfs.vfat on the wrong device in the hurry.. anyone know if it's possible to restore the ntfs again with all files?
i am doing it right now, but is it possible to just restore the fs, testdisk seem to only find the vfat partition
make an image of the whole disk and work on it with file recovery tools like photorec and the like... its all i can think of...
